News.Title: Woman in the running for post of Kerala Police chief for first time
News.Description: For the first time, a woman has been shortlisted for the post of Kerala Police chief.

News.Title: Woman in the running for post of Kerala Police chief for first time
News.Description: For the first time, a woman has been shortlisted for the post of Kerala Police chief. On Thursday, the Union Public Service Commission (UPSC) committee prepared a final list of three to be considered for the post of director general of police in charge of law and order. One of the three recommended is Kerala fire force chief B Sandhya.
